meanings.definition: A person who carries or uses a pistol.
meanings.sent1: The pistoliers practiced shooting at the range.
meanings.sent2: The town sheriff was known to be a skilled pistoliers.
meanings.sent3: The pistoliers had a friendly competition to see who could hit the most targets.
meanings.sent4: In the wild west, the pistoliers were like modern-day cowboys.
meanings.sent5: The image of the pistoliers aiming their pistols was etched in his mind.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals armed with pistols.
meanings.sent1: The pistoliers gathered at the saloon before heading out on their mission.
meanings.sent2: The gang of pistoliers rode into town, causing a stir.
meanings.sent3: The pistoliers decided to have a pistol duel for fun.
meanings.sent4: The pistoliers stood in a line, ready to defend their territory.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the pistoliers marching in unison was intimidating.
